nodes.bodyText:
Should it be renamed to proxyContext? Used "proxyContextPath" since it was used here 
  
    
      carbon-identity-framework/components/identity-core/org.wso2.carbon.identity.core/src/main/java/org/wso2/carbon/identity/core/util/IdentityCoreConstants.java
    
    
         Line 33
      in
      4f6342e
    
    
    
    

        
          
           public static final String PROXY_CONTEXT_PATH = "ProxyContextPath";

A small suggestion.
I noticed that some parts of URL building logic is duplicated between fetchAbsoluteUrl and fetchRelativeUrl methods.
Can't we refactor the fetchAbsoluteUrl method to call the fetchRelativeUrl method internally?
Since this is used multiple times lets move it to a constant
